entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38171: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #279
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36435: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #278
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-44487: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #277
  • .NET October 2023 Updates #276

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Load X509Certificate2 with CreateFromPemFile #93319
  • USE_ARM_INTRINSICS_FOR_CUCKOO_FILTER is not defined for Linux/Mac #93318
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties.Index should be uint #93316
  • Custom Marshaller codefix uses `nint` by default for unmanaged type with no indication that it should be changed #93315
    9.0.0
  • Options Validation source generator runs primary code generation phase on keypress #93313
    9.0.0
  • Logging source generator reruns code generation phase on keypress. #93309
    9.0.0
  • [Metrics] `error.type` doesn't report `Exception.FullName` #93302
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'next != def && "found def after use"' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector128_1.VectorGetAndWithElement__GetAndWithElementInt321:RunReflectionScenario( #93300
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupIsa(intrin.id))' in 'Runtime_92537:Mul #93299
    9.0.0
  • JIT\Stress\ABI\pinvokes_d tests timed out #93297
    8.0.0
  • Memory Leaks in HttpHandler and the underneath infrastructure #93294
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Canonicalization tests don't build or run #93290
  • Improve Buffer.BulkMoveWithWriteBarrier #93288
  • Augment TensorPrimitives for post-.NET 8 #93286
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient - error An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host #93276
    9.0.0
  • Invalid import in `bin/Release/net8.0/browser-wasm/AppBundle/main.mjs` #93274
    8.0.0
  • experiment with running tests in parallel within some collections #93273
    9.0.0
  • blazor publish build fails #93279
  • Test failure System.Data.Tests.DataSetTypedDataSetTest.TypedDataSet #93271
  • Investigate UTF8/UTF16 transcoding with AVX512 #93269
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - AndroidMessageHandler - Cannot access a disposed object #93252
    8.0.0
  • X509Certificate2Collection.Import() fails with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException: An internal error occurred #92921
    Future
  • Algorithm 'AesGcm' is not supported on this platform but platform is supported #92482
    Future
  • Pointer Type objects IsClass returning unexpected value. #92367
  • Apply `[ExcludeFromCodeCoverage]` to generated code #93236
    Future
  • Missing space for timezone in "en-US" culture LongTimePattern in MacOS Sonoma & .NET 7 #93310
    7.0.x
  • not working httputility #93293
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-44487: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #93303
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36435: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #93304
    7.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38171: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #93305
    7.0.x
  • Profiling is not working on Alpine on 8.0.100-rc.1.23455.8 #93122
  • Dotnet 7 can not work with openssl 1.1.1f #89126
    9.0.0
  • DotNet6.0 - Incorrect DateTimeFormat for CultureInfo #93215
    Future
  • Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter fails occasionally #93229
    9.0.0
  • CBOR does not handle canonical NaN correctly #92080
    9.0.0
  • Configuration Binding Generator Initializes Suffixed Default Values Incorrectly #92773
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `Task.FromResult`, but for enumerations #93281
  • Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #84564
    Future
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #93272
  • arm64 altjit and HW intrinsics #77294
    Future
  • System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred. (The SSL connection could not be established) #91588

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename JitDisablePgo to JitDisablePGO #93320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix emitOutputLJ trying to encode large displacements #93312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #93307
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • Fix the test template for LoadVectorx* #93301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve a vector implementation to support alignment and non-temporal tores #93296
    area-System.Numerics
  • Make atomics `GenTreeIndir`-derived #93295
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change a few more uses of `new T[]` with a span to collection expressions #93292
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] [android][ios] Fix dispose problem with NativeHttpHandlers (#93262) #93291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Use collection expression in foreach in CreateManifestAndDescriptors #93289
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Clean up some ifdefs in EventSource #93287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [RISC-V] Fix dropping NaN sign and payload when importing float constants #93285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Resolve asset URL only once #93275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Entitle macOS executables while building #92967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete `AuthenticationManager` of `System.Net.Requests` #93171
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Enable ldp reordering for TYP_FLOAT #93248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #93306
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • Rename `server.socket.address` to `network.peer.address` #93255
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the `System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.` in Methodical_r2.sh-deep_array_nz_r.dll when DOTNET_GCStress=4. #93186
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Second try at using C11 atomics #91808
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [android][ios] Fix dispose problem with NativeHttpHandlers #93262
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use Sync Send methods in Sync HttpClient tests #93139
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock jump target private #93152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Decimal literal formatting in source generators #93160
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Delete docs/design/features/cross-platform-cryptography.md #93270
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve tests for exponential trim analysis problems #93232
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Make it easy to run blazor startup measurements #93209
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make Emitted Attribute Order Deterministic in Options Source Generator #93260
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93089
    area-Interop-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve disk full test #92682
    area-System.IO
  • Enable DotNETRuntimePrivate provider #93245
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adjust the DNS lookup duration metric #93254
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Skip Jitted Methods Counting Test when DOTNET_EnableHWIntrinsic=0 #93264
    test-bug, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Speed up calling interface methods #93100
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix memory leak in MemoryCache #92550
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Added 'standalone' option when building tests for ilasm roundtrip #93037
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndInsertScalar APIs #93197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] drop `create_task_callback` and `mono_wasm_marshal_promise` #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add SuppressSingleFileAnalysisWarnings option to ILC and use it in runtime tests #93200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Avoid membarrier on lower Android versions #93096
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Make a copy of assembly path. #93253
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Handle binding to initialized abstract members #93120
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93193
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated #92684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • WIP: experimental LoadLibrary monitoring in CoreCLR native runtime #93258
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalarNx2 for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Reference live ILLink analyzer #93259
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [QUIC] Cleaned up TlsSecret and added test. #93119
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder #93115
    area-System.Reflection
  • Remove a few unnecessary `unsafe` keyword uses in TensorPrimitives #93219
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some issues for CoreRoot test cases: #93187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [MT][browser] Allow CI failures on library MT tests #93224
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression: `dotnet tool restore` with a `dotnet-tools.json` is broken in .NET 8 RC 2 #35989
  • Add test coverage for minimum roslyn version in APICompat task #35986
  • Re-implement deleted StaticFileHandlerTest tests #35971

Closed

  • SDK resolver failure when an older SDK is also installed #35334
    Discussion
  • ASP.NET Core 3.1 get slow build on SDK 7.0.400 #35200
  • CheckForDuplicateItems case sensitive #35693
  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies not respected in 8.0.100-rc.1.23463.5 #35817
  • Net 8.0 RC During build System.Text.Json NuGet isn't copied to bin folder (in net 7.0 its still copied) #35816
    Discussion
  • Unable to publish to Alpine image, executable not found or runtime identifier 'linux-musl-x64' not supported #35981
  • "dotnet test" fails to write crash dump #15706
  • Release 7.0.400 breaks Github actions where `dotnet test` works against net462 on non-windows targets #34605
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Task package no longer works with older SDKs #35468
    8.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 SDK installed, The message "Manifest package for microsoft.net.sdk.aspire doesn't exist" displays during installing workload. #35921

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #35982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #35980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix CodeAnalysis version used by APICompat assemblies #35963
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.1xx
  • Add .gitignore to exclude files generated by test #35940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0036 "Modifiers are not ordered" cleanup #35956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to the svc pool for 7.0.4xx #35948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make CheckForDuplicateItems case insensitive #35697
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #35976
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #35979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #35978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #35977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #35975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move compatibility tools into common folder #35964
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Update APICompat & GenAPI CodeAnalysis versions #35958
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    Area-WebSDK
  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest-8.0.100 as a dependency #35569
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35907
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #35913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution #7591

Merged

  • Fix typo #7590

Updated

  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failure in CSharpOperationFactory when encountering invalid LINQ query syntax #70329
  • EditorConfig GUI editor doesn't work for anything else than files named .editorconfig and in specific locations #70326
  • "Cannot navigate to the symbol" message box after successfully opening definition #70323
  • Missing error for interceptors for dynamic calls #70321
  • Overload resolution prefers Span<T> over ReadOnlySpan<T> for collection expression #70318
    17.8
  • Interceptor for non-existing methods? #70317
  • Pull method up to interface doesn't show interface name when method name is too long (matters when multiple interfaces) #70316
  • Inline hints should cache and reuse measurement data #70315
  • Visual Studio C# text editor indentation for "else switch" #70314
  • Callbacks into DocumentDiagnosticAnalyzer should be determined by DiagnosticAnalyzerCategory #70312
  • False erorrs with generic interceptors #70311
  • Interceptors do not report nullability warnings when type parameter constraints are not satisfied #70310

Closed

  • An exception is thrown when getting the compilation. #66556
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34210.145 #70327
  • Is it possible to use MSBuildWorkspace on a device without MSBuild.exe? #70313
  • C# doesn't allow for methods with optional `System.Half` parameters #70300

PullRequests

Created

  • Change Blazor template group name for newer templates #70330
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution #70328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • In most cases, remove the camel case matching for case sensitive matches #70324
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • File types need to account for pathmap #70322
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Fix regression that caused us to sync data unnecessarily. #70320
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations in CreateCompilationTrackerMap #70319
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support to the LSIF generator for document symbols #70304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Short-circuit tagger usage of interval tree when tagging complete snapshot #70285
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include sqlite binaries to enable persistent storage in vscode #70162
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ask for source generated state up front when getting the compile time solution #70205
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70286
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Replace Roslyn.Utilities.IReadOnlySet with System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlySet #70297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve performance on SymbolCompletionProviderTests #70307
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Unskip working tests #70266
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New error after updating from RC1 to RC2: Method not found: 'Boolean Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LogHelper.IsEnabled #51280
  • SendPasswordResetLinkAsync Identity RC2 - breakpoint never hit + not clear what it is for #51278
  • [.NET 8 RC2] Add DataAnnotiationsValidator to the identity template Login.razor #51277
  • Global option has no effect on the Blazor Web App template when Auth is selected in NET8 RC2. #51274
  • Missing Microsoft.NET.Runtime.Emscripten.3.1.12 #51273
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #51272
  • Perf regression: mapaction #51271
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #51270
  • Blazor crash in render diff internals #51267
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-44487: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #51264
  • Static routes as string parameters for better SSR (enhancement nav) experience. #51263
  • Blazor WebAssembly throws: No .NET call dispatcher has been set. #51258
    Backlog
  • NewtonsoftJsonHubProtocol does not seem to respect setting for MaxDepth #51254
  • [API Proposal]: Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #51250
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add support to the QuickGrid paginator for static server rendering #51249
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Request to customize the http request header sent by HttpClient created in Blazor #51247

Closed

  • [Blazor] Interactive server components can't receive Blazor endpoint updates during circuit reconnection #51082
    8.0.0
  • RequestDelegateGenerator intercepts incorrect methods #51233
  • Blazor template hamburger menu renders incorrectly on Android Chrome #51246
  • Perf regression: json #51239
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #51251
  • Improve default value handling in RDG #51241
  • Use Date Pipe for Angular Client #39274
    Backlog
  • Rewrite React template as function component with hooks #40540
    .NET 8 Planning
  • The DailyBuilds page does not contain any links to Linux installers #51176
  • IHtmlContent can break ExceptionHandlerMiddleware and DeveloperExceptionPgaeMiddleware. Resulting in a blank page in production. #50825
  • Razor Class Library not rendering/serving static content (i.e. "_content/{PACKAGE}/file.js") on MACOS #50715
  • AuthenticationState should detect changes to cookie states outside Context #50858
  • WPF/Blazor Hybrid - web events not fired when Razor pages are in a separate Razor control library #50990
  • Blazor automatically detects when a new version is available and attempts to update itself. #51257
  • Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters for OAuth/OIDC #39243
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Register_create New Account_Status Messages: Narrator is not announcing error message appeared when required fields are kept empty. #51156
    8.0.0
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_login_Use A Local Account to Login_Label or instructions: No visual instructions are provided for the sighted users to identify the input fields are required fields. #51153
    8.0.0
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_login_Non-Text Contrast :Color contrast ratio of "Remember me" checkbox is (1.819:1) which is less than required 3:1 #51127
    8.0.0
  • add exception in documentation with nginx and cloudflare #45522
    8.0.0
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextWithFilter #50982
  • Perf improvement: json #51207
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #51213
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json #51214
  • Perf improvement: updates #51238
  • Mvc.Testing.Handlers.RedirectHandler => MaxRedirects does not allow 0 #50925
  • [Blazor] Page created in Client project is not discovered from URL in .NET 8 RC1 #51237

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Invoke `LocationChanged` for interactive components when an enhanced navigation occurs #51279
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51276
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Dispose secret instances #51253
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Remove temporary APIs now Razor compiler is updated #51252
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Defer enhanced component updates until reconnection circuit completes #51242
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #51265
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #51266
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Rename metrics tag exception.type to error.type #51084
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0.0
  • Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51243
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Blazor Web Template Accessibility #51231
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Fix MaxRedirects check in RedirectHandler #51245
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix handling of default values in RDG #51193
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Emit action attribute when not explicit. #51130
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware, 8.0.0
  • Remove MapIdentityApi's InfoResponse.Claims property #51177
    Servicing-approved, area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-dump is incredibly slow in dumpheap scenario #1637
    8.0.0
  • DumpMT disabled in SOS.OtherCommands for .NET 7.0+ #3516
    8.0.0
  • SOS sets the invalid parameter handler in the CRT on Windows in an unsafe way #4070
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515
    8.0.0
  • Document how to use createdump on native AOT apps #4150
    8.0.0
  • How can I install dotnet tools on runtime only pod? #4140
    8.0.0
  • Diagnostics Repo Engineering Summary #3884

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [UITests] Legacy iOS tests currently not producing results on main #17945
    .NET 8 GA
  • The current activity cannot be detected #17944
  • Blazor Hybrid app - database no longer works on Android in Release mode after RC1 #17943
  • When a Shape (Line, Path, etc) changes size, the layout size does not change, so the Shape gets clipped #17942
  • Maui Splash Screen will not update on iOS App #17940
  • Off color Switch bar #17939
  • Label FormattedString not reacting to AppThemeBinding change at runtime #17938
    .NET 8 GA
  • Localization rendering issue when language is right to left [iOS] #17934
  • Android: FileNotFoundException only in Release-Mode when using System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo(...) #17932
  • SkiaSharp signature check fails for deployment (Visual Studio local iOS device) #17930
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] Recipe splash screen logo missing on iOS #17925
  • [MAUI] SplashScreen resize=false failed to work on iOS. #17924
  • Selecting a link in a WebView on iOS causes a NSInternalInconsistencyException #17923
  • AppTheme behaving incorrectly in flyout menu #17922

Closed

  • [Android] When a user taps off of an input control the keyboard no longer closes #12002
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Memory Leak issue in ListView #16450

  • Issues with Upgrading Firebase Authentication Package and Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser in .NET MAUI #17935
  • EmbeddedReferenceJar has no equivalent in MAUI #17826
  • Nested Border objects do not layout their Bounds correctly based on expected settings (iOS/Android/Windows) #17763
  • Issue when Publish a Mac Catalyst app for distribution outside the Mac App Store #17820

Created

  • Update README.md #17941
    community ✨

Merged

  • Dev/scoban/getridofxamuit #17849

Updated

    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1

  • [net8.0] Update to rtm versions #17904
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 + Servicing

  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    .NET 8 SR1

    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GroupBy() isn't working as expected unless I first load the individual items into memory #32014
  • EFCore 8 RC cannot map (dynamic / object) in complex type #32012
  • EF Core transaction order incorrect due to FK constraint #32010
  • Migrations bundle requires an appsettings file if a named connection string is used #32009
  • NoInverseProperty attribute #32005

Closed

  • TemporalAll fails with JSON columns #30478
    8.0.0
  • Replacing PK to PK TPT or TPC dependent with different type fails #29874
    8.0.0
  • Bug: Seeding binary data + migration causes issues (memory + duration) #21065
    Backlog
  • Combination of split queries and limit/order leads to inconsistent inclusions #31975
  • Add migrations with different assemblies, using Console App. #31948
  • ComplexType doesn't work with Lazy Loading #32008

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32016
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #29297 - Seeding issue with JSON columns in EF Core 7 #32015
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #32013
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30478 - TemporalAll fails with JSON columns #32006
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Send update commands for the deleted shared identity entity when not mapped to the same table. #32007
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #31961 - Projection filtering on second-level reference could not be translated #31996
    Servicing-approved
  • Add member name param to TagWithCallSite #32002
